events.message: The policyholder reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of January 9th involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after verifying the description of the incident and involved vehicle types.
An insurance agent specialized in automotive claims was assigned to handle the case and initiate communication with the claimant.
The claimant received an email confirmation acknowledging receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining the next steps for document submission.
Request sent to claimant for accident photographs, police report, and repair estimates needed to process the claim efficiently.
Claimant has submitted all required documents, including photos of the vehicle damage, official police report, and a repair shop invoice.
Investigation into the collision details and liability began, including contacting witnesses and reviewing traffic camera footage.
Investigation concluded confirming fault of the other driver and validating the claimant's damages and injury reports.
A settlement offer was prepared based on damage appraisal and policy coverage limits and sent to the claimant for review.
Claimant responded expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling of their claim and clarity of the settlement terms.
Claim officially approved by the insurance team after claimant accepted the settlement offer presented in prior communication.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement amount was processed and transferred to the claimant's account successfully.
The claim has been formally closed following payment completion with all documentation archived and claimant notified.
